column5: With a high of 89*F (31*C) today and 83* (29*) tomorrow and a UV index of 9 (on a scale of 1-10) because there isn't a cloud in the sky, there will be many sunburns at the race.  Lotsa insanity going on in town and the liquor store has even opened up 2 hrs. early every day this week!  Ol Yeller drove past the track on the Interstate last night on her way home from work and said the smoke from all the BBQ grills reduced visibility by 50% and you could smell every kind of meat cooking imaginable.  Gonna be lots of drunk Rednecks, traffic tickets, and several   -es will go to jail.  It's a helluva party... but I think I'll stay home and work in the yard... those race folks is crazy yanno!

I'm just sitting on my deck looking out over Scugog and you can feel the humidity rolling in here already.....suppose to be upwards of 27 here today. Can't wait a couple more weeks till pics open up. I'll be watching the rednecks race later.....should be exciting.
Pretty sure that's a seven on the Ball Hang Factor!! Nice!!!!!!
OOOOOOOOOOOOO DOGGIE!!!!   BOOGITY, BOOGITY, BOOGITY LETS GET SWEATIN' BOYS!!!!!!!
At least all the road-kill will get cleaned up.
